title: Agricultural Equity Act of 1995
content: Agricultural Equity Act of 1995 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to make price support loans and deficiency payments through 2002 for wheat, feed grains, rice, upland cotton, and oilseeds. Provides for increased flex acreage. Requires crop insurance as a condition of program eligibility. Directs the Secretary to review the status and future of production agriculture, including development of related legislative proposals.
